Section.text.data1.light: When you visit our site, cookies are placed on your computer, mobile phone or tablet. </br></br></br>The only cookies used by this site are those intended for audience measurement purposes and do not collect personal data. Audience measurement tools are deployed to obtain information on visitor navigation. In particular, they make it possible to understand how users arrive on a site and to reconstruct their journey.
